title: So Many Things I Want to Do!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Chika-san, Rin saw your livestream~! The stuff you’re doing seems really fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>You did? Thank you~! Ehehe, I just thought that I should do everything that I like.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin wants to do all kinds of things too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ah, the gaming stream you did with Yoshiko-chan the other day was amusing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ah, you saw that? Rin had fun on that too nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I’ve always wanted to do a gaming stream, so it’s a good reference~. Will you be doing something like that again, Rin-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hmm, games are nice, but Rin wants to try stuff that involves moving your body nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Moving your body? Like stretching or dancing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Maybe more like, “let’s explore spring with Rin”? We’ll be searching for flowers and bugs on it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I want to try that too! Uuu, there are too many things I want to do~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
